mapper.select: select s.id, sum(s.integral) as integralCount, ifnull(c.collectCount, 0) as collectCount, ifnull(b.browseCount, 0) as browseCount, ifnull(co.couponCount, 0) as couponCount from sys_member s left join (select user_id, count(good_id) as collectCount from bu_good_member_collect group by user_id) c on s.id = c.user_id left join (select user_id, count(good_id) as browseCount from sys_member_browse group by user_id) b on s.id = b.user_id left join (select user_id, count(coupon_id) as couponCount from bu_member_coupon where used = 0 group by user_id) co on s.id = co.user_id where s.id = #{memberId} group by s.id
